original_text: and lay his hand on its head and kill it in front of the tent of meeting, and the sons of Aaron shall throw its blood against the sides of the altar.
korean_text: 그것의 머리에 안수하고 회막 앞에서 잡을 것이요 아론의 자손은 그 피를 제단 사방에 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and lay his hand on its head
and kill it in front of the tent of meeting
and the sons of Aaron shall throw its blood
sentences.korean_translation: 아론의 아들들은 그 피를 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: against the sides of the altar.
